Reviews.Title: “Ive stayed in hotels in 3rd world countries that were better than this hole”

Reviews.Content: disgraceful called “the london literally stayed worse entire life standing silence despite questions receptionist search own name list guests finally key 12 shower mildew walls wet shower hand held holder wall broken addition shower shower allow standing water drain hole ceiling bathroom plaster falling significant draft coming am unsure scratching sounds i’m hazard guess sink dirty standing water partner 3 hand towels cups complete tea bags sugar milk kettle rendered useless single pane window close properly cold hear outside tv poorly hand modified coax cable fit questioned receptionist portable aerial fix greeted response “no refurbishing that” categorically deny sign looked refurbished set drawers contained empty packet cigarettes screws light main wall bulb plug sockets wall coming appear safe poor nights sleep ventured breakfast stank grease cooking oil greeted lady word wandered imagine eagerly awaiting breakfast didn’t pick told consists eggs toast butter ensure future stay million miles utter cesspit building bring hotel feel beliefs words

Reviews.Title: “Cheap for a reason”
Reviews.Author: Boabe Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel ok suppose friend stay scotland brazil game holes walls cockroach beds ok shower ok friends pretty grim looking close walk emirates half hour plenty pubs walk overall didnt pay lot £90 nights paid

Reviews.Title: “violent aggressive staff in crap hole - had to call police”

Reviews.Content: shelton hotel location hard starters arrived 24 hour reception glorified shed repulsive looking hotel ive seen refused check despite booking information printed check bookings asserted cancelled strangely received email phone call cancelling booking hotel unlocked friend mine ventured inside manager receptionist locked hotel pushed friends aside called police unhelpful thug pass receptionist eyes removed bookings list folder presumably erase evidence booking phone cab dangerous islington paying £200 home recommend hotel dreadful night rude aggressive nasty hotel looked hideous happy leave 5 women stranded late saturday rough considering legal options moment
